initial_question.title: smartscreen
initial_question.body:
Hi SnapKey Team,

I've been interested in using SnapKey, but I've encountered a couple of security warnings. SmartScreen flagged it as malicious, and VirusTotal showed one flag. Could you provide any information or assurances regarding these concerns?

Thanks for your help, [ro6axe]

satisfaction_conditions: Software safety verification method is presented
Transparency about security implications is maintained
